English:
After dealing damage, gain 1 stack of <color=#DC143C>Flawless Shot</color>.

<color=#48D1CC>Longbow</color> – Draw 1 skill prioritizing the user skills at 4 stacks.
<color=#FFD700>Yumi</color> – Gain 1 stack 'Focused Concentration' at 4 stacks.
Chinese:
攻击命中时获得1层<color=#DC143C>皆中</color>。
<color=#48D1CC>单弓</color> - 层数达到上限时，移除该增益并优先抽取1个自己的技能。
<color=#FFD700>和弓</color> - 层数达到上限时，移除该增益并获得[全神贯注]。

English: Increase damage by 25% for the next skill played from hand that cost 2 or more.
Chinese: 使自身下1个2费以上的技能造成的伤害提升25%。

English:
All allies can target enemy with 'Tracking Skill' debuff regardless of Taunt status.
When this unit dies, obtain 200 gold.
Chinese:
目标可以无条件被指定为技能目标；
目标死亡时，获得200金币。

English: Hit Rate above 100% is converted into Critical Chance.
Chinese: 攻击时若命中率超过100%，则超出的数值将增加到暴击率。

English:
Can target all enemies regardless of their Taunt status.
<color=#FA8072>Armor Penetration</color>: &a
Chinese:
手中的攻击技能获得无视嘲讽。
当前<color=#FA8072>穿甲</color>：&a

English: &user can target this enemy regardless of its Taunt status.
Chinese: &user可以无视嘲讽攻击这个单位。

English:
Can target enemies with the 'Archer's Mark' debuff regardless of their Taunt status.
Apply 'Archer's Mark' to the enemy you attacked.
The next attack deals +100% damage to an enemy with 'Archer's Mark'.
Remove 'Archer's Mark' and draw 1 skill.
Chinese:
攻击时会向目标施加[射手印记]：施加者可以无视嘲讽攻击[射手印记]的目标；
再次命中拥有[射手印记]的敌人时，消除场上所有[射手印记]，本次造成伤害翻倍，并且抽取1个功能。

English: My arrows can see through all lies.
Chinese: 我的箭可以看穿所有谎言。

English: Anchor Point - Rio cannot deal critical hits, However, she gains exceptional accuracy with each level-up. Any Hit Rate above 100% converts into Armor Penetration. Target's Armor is reduced by an amount equal to Armor Penetration. In Longbow stance, Rio can target all enemies regardless of their Taunt status. Her skills gain bonus effects depending on her stance. In Yumi stance, Rio gains 20% increased Hit Rate. Her skills gain bonus effects depending on her stance.
Chinese: 锚点 - 莉央无法造成暴击，但是升级时获得远超常人的命中率提升。莉央超过100%的那部分命中率转化为50%的穿甲。 穿甲 - 莉央攻击时视作目标减少等量于穿甲的防御力。 单弓 - 莉央在单弓形态下手中的攻击技能获得无视嘲讽；且部分技能会触发额外效果。 和弓 - 莉央在和弓形态下增加20%命中率；且部分技能会触发额外效果。

English:
Rio is a skill-based archer who balances fragility with deadly precision.

She cannot deal critical hits and has low health and defense. However, she gains exceptional accuracy with each level-up. Any Hit Rate above 100% is converted into Armor Penetration, up to a maximum of 50%.

Rio wields two offensive stances: 'Longbow' and 'Yumi.' In 'Longbow' stance, her attacks are rapid and precise, allowing her to strike swiftly from a distance. In 'Yumi' stance, her shots are powerful and devastating, delivering lethal blows at the cost of speed.

Mastering the art of stance-switching and relying on her teammates' protection, Rio unleashes relentless firepower on her enemies.
Chinese:
莉央是拥有两种输出手段、脆弱但致命的技巧型射手。

莉央无法造成暴击，并且拥有较低的生命值和防御力，但是升级时获得远超常人的命中率提升。她溢出的命中率将会转化为穿甲效果，攻击时视作目标减少等量的防御力。此外，莉央拥有“单弓”和“和弓”两种输出形态，在“单弓”形态下，她的攻击迅捷而轻巧；在“和弓”形态下，她的攻击猛烈且致命。

合理地利用两种形态的切换，在队友的保护下编织出浓烈的火力网吧。

English: I will see you all clearly.
No matter what kind of target comes, it doesn't matter. I just have to hit it.
Chinese: 不管来什么样的目标都没关系。仅仅是将它射中而已。

English: In this situation, can I still call it self-defense?
Chinese: 这种情况，我还能说是正当防卫么。
我的箭不会让你失望的。

English: Mm, I'll show you the proper way to shoot.
Chinese: 嗯，我会给你展示正确的射法。

English: Might as well open it first.
With a little modification, can this be used as a bow?
Chinese: 稍微加工一下，能不能当弓来用呢？

English: I really want to eat potato stew.
Compared to the water on the island...
I have no regrets. After all, I’ve already given it my all.
Chinese: 我不后悔。毕竟我已经尽了我的全力了。

English: Chiyo... why did you... that day...?
I will keep fighting to survive. I will continue to draw my bow.
Chinese: 我会生存下去。继续拉起弓。

English: Not yet... At least... Not now...
Royal Flush! That’s the extent of my power~
Chinese: 皇家同花顺！这就是我的实力~

English: The Arrow of Justice will pierce through all evil.
Chinese: 正义之矢将穿透所有邪恶。

English: You're blocking my sunlight. Please move aside!
Chinese: 你挡住我晒太阳了。麻烦请让开！

English: Special material. Using this item guarantees the synthesis of equipment with an Attack Power or Critical Rate bonus.
Chinese: 特殊素材。用这个道具必定能合成出带有攻击力或暴击率加成的装备。

English:
Switch stance between <color=#48D1CC>Longbow</color> and <color=#FFD700>Yumi</color>.
Cost is reduced by 1 if this skill is a fixed ability.
The fixed ability is refreshed each time you activate <color=#DC143C>Flawless Shot</color>.
Chinese:
使自身切换<color=#48D1CC>单弓</color>/<color=#FFD700>和弓</color>状态。
作为固定技能时，<color=#DC143C>皆中</color>解除时变为可以使用的状态。

English:
<color=#48D1CC>Longbow</color> – This skill can be played repeatedly during this turn.
<color=#FFD700>Yumi</color> – Cost reduced by 1.
Chinese:
<color=#48D1CC>单弓</color> - 本回合内可再次释放1次。
<color=#FFD700>和弓</color> - 降低1点费用。

English:
<color=#48D1CC>Longbow</color> – Gain Swiftness.
<color=#FFD700>Yumi</color> – lncrease damage by &a equal to 35% Attack Power.
Chinese:
<color=#48D1CC>单弓</color> - 附带迅速。
<color=#FFD700>和弓</color> - 额外造成&a(35%)伤害。

English:
Focused Concetrarion' damage increased to 50%.

<color=#48D1CC>Longbow</color> – If you defeat an enemy with this skill, remove Overload and restore 1 mana.
<color=#FFD700>Yumi</color> – Apply Countdown 1. lncrease damage by &a equal to 50% of the user's Attack Power.
Chinese:
从[全神贯注]获得的提升翻倍。

<color=#48D1CC>单弓</color> - 如果击杀敌人，消除自身的过载，返还1点法力值。
<color=#FFD700>和弓</color> - 附带倒计时1。额外造成&a(50%)伤害。

English:
<color=#48D1CC>Longbow</color> – Attack all enemies, apply <color=#54FF9F>Wind Damage</color>.
<color=#FFD700>Yumi</color> – lncrease damage by &a equal to 35% Attack Power. When cast on enemy with Taunt status, Attack all enemies.
Chinese:
<color=#48D1CC>单弓</color> - 变为指向所有敌人。施加<color=#54FF9F>风伤</color>。
<color=#FFD700>和弓</color> - 额外造成&a(35%)伤害。如果目标拥有嘲讽状态，则同时指定所有非嘲讽状态的敌人。

English: Decrease all enemies' action points by 1.
Increase all enemies' action points by 1.
Chinese: 使所有敌人行动倒计时+1

English:
Choose one -
Increase all enemies' action points by 1.
Or decrease all enemies' action points by 1.
Deal &a damage equal to 50% of the user's Attack Power to an enemy with the lowest action point. Draw 1 skill and switch stance between <color=#48D1CC>Longbow</color> and <color=#FFD700>Yumi</color>.
Chinese:
选择 - 使所有敌人行动倒计时+1；
使所有敌人行动倒计时-1。
那之后，对行动倒计时最低的敌人造成&a(50%)伤害，抽取1个技能，使自身切换<color=#48D1CC>单弓</color>/<color=#FFD700>和弓</color>状态。
可以指向不能被指定的单位。

English: Draw 1 skill prioritizing the user Attack skills.
Chinese: 优先抽取1个目标的攻击技能。

English: One Hundred Shots, One Hundred Hits
Draw 2 skills and consume 300 gold to receive a random potion.
Chinese:
抽取2个技能。
如果金币超过300，自动消耗300金币获得1个随机药水。

English:
<color=#48D1CC>Longbow</color> –  Cast this attack twice. If the target has Taunt status, remove it. Otherwise, stun the target with a (<sprite=2>&a%) chance.
<color=#FFD700>Yumi</color> –  lncrease damage by &b equal to 250% of the user's Attack Power. Take 35% more damage this turn.
Chinese:
<color=#48D1CC>单弓</color> - 重复释放2次。如果目标拥有嘲讽状态，使其失去嘲讽状态；否则使其(<sprite=2>&a%)眩晕1回合。
<color=#FFD700>和弓</color> - 额外造成&b(250%)伤害。本回合内，自身造成伤害提升35%。
